an10.23:1.1: “Atthi, bhikkhave, dhamma kayena pahatabba, no vacaya.
an10.23:1.2: Atthi, bhikkhave, dhamma vacaya pahatabba, no kayena.
an10.23:1.3: Atthi, bhikkhave, dhamma neva kayena pahatabba no vacaya, pannaya disva pahatabba.
an10.23:2.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhamma kayena pahatabba, no vacaya?
an10.23:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akusalam apanno hoti kinci desam kayena.
an10.23:2.4: ‘ayasma kho akusalam apanno kinci desam kayena.
an10.23:2.5: Sadhu vatayasma kayaduccaritam pahaya kayasucaritam bhavetu’ti.
an10.23:2.6: So anuvicca vinnuhi sabrahmacarihi vuccamano kayaduccaritam pahaya kayasucaritam bhaveti.
an10.23:2.7: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, dhamma kayena pahatabba, no vacaya.
an10.23:3.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhamma vacaya pahatabba, no kayena?
an10.23:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akusalam apanno hoti kinci desam vacaya.
an10.23:3.4: ‘ayasma kho akusalam apanno kinci desam vacaya.
an10.23:3.5: Sadhu vatayasma vaciduccaritam pahaya vacisucaritam bhavetu’ti.
an10.23:3.6: So anuvicca vinnuhi sabrahmacarihi vuccamano vaciduccaritam pahaya vacisucaritam bhaveti.
an10.23:3.7: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, dhamma vacaya pahatabba, no kayena.
an10.23:4.1: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhamma neva kayena pahatabba no vacaya, pannaya disva pahatabba?
an10.23:4.2: Lobho, bhikkhave, neva kayena pahatabbo no vacaya, pannaya disva pahatabbo.
an10.23:4.9: macchariyam, bhikkhave, neva kayena pahatabbam no vacaya, pannaya disva pahatabbam.
an10.23:5.1: Papika, bhikkhave, issa neva kayena pahatabba no vacaya, pannaya disva pahatabba.
an10.23:5.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ijjhati gahapatissa va gahapatiputtassa va dhanena va dhannena va rajatena va jatarupena va.
an10.23:5.4: Tatrannatarassa dasassa va upavasassa va evam hoti:
an10.23:5.5: ‘aho vatimassa gahapatissa va gahapatiputtassa va na ijjheyya dhanena va dhannena va rajatena va jatarupena va’ti.
an10.23:5.6: Samano va pana brahmano va labhi hoti civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam.
an10.23:5.7: Tatrannatarassa samanassa va brahmanassa va evam hoti:
an10.23:6.1: Papika, bhikkhave, iccha neva kayena pahatabba no vacaya, pannaya disva pahatabba.
an10.23:6.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco assaddho samano ‘saddhoti mam janeyyun’ti icchati;
an10.23:6.13: Ime vuccanti, bhikkhave, dhamma neva kayena pahatabba no vacaya, pannaya disva pahatabba.
an10.23:7.1: Tance, bhikkhave, bhikkhum lobho abhibhuyya iriyati,
an10.23:7.12: ‘nayamayasma tatha pajanati yatha pajanato lobho na hoti, tathahimam ayasmantam lobho abhibhuyya iriyati;
an10.23:7.13: nayamayasma tatha pajanati yatha pajanato doso na hoti …
an10.23:7.21: papika iccha na hoti, tathahimam ayasmantam papika iccha abhibhuyya iriyati’ti.
an10.23:8.1: Tance, bhikkhave, bhikkhum lobho nabhibhuyya iriyati,
an10.23:8.12: ‘tatha ayamayasma pajanati yatha pajanato lobho na hoti, tathahimam ayasmantam lobho nabhibhuyya iriyati;
an10.23:8.13: tatha ayamayasma pajanati yatha pajanato doso na hoti …
an10.23:8.21: papika iccha na hoti, tathahimam ayasmantam papika iccha nabhibhuyya iriyati’”ti.
